phrases: Endeavor's my old man.
He is been stuck as the number two hero for forever.
It is my Shoto's duty to surpass All Might.
If you have something from the number one hero, then I...
In my memories, my mother is always crying.
Your left side is unsightly,
my mother said as she poured boiling water on me.
Without using my damn old man's Quirk...
No...
I will reject him completely by winning first place without using it.
No matter what you are to All Might,
I will rise above you with just my right side.
But I cannot lose, either.
I have to live up to the hopes of those who supported me.
I will beat you, too!
But you want to be a hero, do not you?
It is okay for you to be one.
Before I knew it, I had forgotten what happened after this...
Shoto Todoroki Izuku Midoriya
The first match of the second round!
At this year's sports festival, both have shown top class performances!
Midoriya!
First, he will come at me with ice.
Versus-
Todoroki!
It will be dangerous to let him use that power as he likes.
It is like two great rivals fighting against each other!
Now-
The instant we start...
Start!
Go!
Smash!
So cold!
Just the wind is already this cold?!
Just as I expected.
He was prepared to injure himself to negate the attack.
Wow!
Midoriya stopped Todoroki's attack!
He did not know what scale of attack Young Todoroki would use,
so he abandoned control and fired off a shot at 100!
It is true that that was the only thing he could do against the ice attack...
However!
Smash!
He stopped it again!
Damn...
From what I know of Todoroki's fighting,
he always attacks in an instant, so I do not have much data on him.
Data...
During this fight, I need to find an opening...
The ice he is stuck behind him is probably how he plans to keep from being blown away.
Which means, I was right to use my fingers.
It is likely that it could even work against a 100 smash where I sacrifice my arm.
I have got to look carefully...
Think...
Find it...
I have got six more chances...!
You are...
Five more chances!
It started?!
Kirishima, good job making it to the second round.
Yeah, I will be up against you next, Bakugo.
Let us have a good fight!
I will kill you.
I would like to see you try!
But man, you and Todoroki can both shoot off powerful attacks that cover a lot of ground.
Like Bam!
And you can do it with no time lag.
I am not just shooting them off.
Do not underestimate'them.
Huh?
If you overuse your muscles, the muscle fibers tear,
and if you keep running, you will run out of breath.
There is a limit to how much power I can produce, too.
That is why I designed my costume so that I could fire blasts
in excess of what my body allows without any risk.
Quirks are physical abilities, too.
They must also have some kind of limit.
If I think about it like that, I guess that makes sense...
Then, against the instant-killer Todoroki, Midoriya wants...
I will end this quickly.
Smash!
I have used up all the fingers on my right hand!
Todoroki does not recoil from Midoriya's power and gets in close!
Damn it...!
Oh no, he is so close!
That is a lot more powerful than before.
Are you trying to tell me... to stay away...?
It is not just his Quirk.
His judgment, application skills, mobility...
All of his abilities... are strong!
He is already better than the average pro...
It is like that is what you get from the son of the number two hero.
What, you are that beat up just from defending and running away?
He is trembling...?
Is that how it is...?
Damn it...
Sorry...
Thanks, Midoriya.
That guy's face is clouded over thanks to you.
Without using my damn old man's Quirk...
No...
I will reject him completely by winning first place without using it.
With your arms like that, you cannot fight anymore, can you?
Let us finish this.
Todoroki keeps attacking with overwhelming power!
Here comes the finishing ice attack!
Where are you looking?
Bastard...
With your broken finger...?
Why are you going so far?
You are trembling, Todoroki.
Quirks are physical abilities, too.
There is a limit to how much cold your body can take, is not there?
And is not that something you could solve by using the heat from your left side?
Everyone is fighting with everything they have got...
To win and get closer to their dream...
To become number one...
You want to win with just half your strength?!
You have not put a single scratch on me yet, you know!
Come at with me with everything you have got!
You want to win with just half your strength?!
You have not put a single scratch on me yet, you know!
Come at with me with everything you have got!
Young Midoriya...
Todoroki is not you, either.
That boy...
Midoriya...
What are you planning?
Everything I have got?
Did my damn old man buy you off or something?
Now I am angry!
His movements are...
It is because frost fell on his body...
Unlike the limit to my power, it is probably like the MP in a game...
Was the scale during his fight with Flat Face the upper limit?
In close quarters, you will not be able to do anything about it!
The instant I lifted my right foot...
This guy...!
Imagine... the microwave...
It will not explode...
It will not...
It will not...!
It will not...!
A solid hit!
We have got some action!
He got a hit on Todoroki!
Even though Midoriya looks way more beat up...
I cannot believe he went on the offensive here!
Why...?
The ice is not coming as fast...
Should I stop it, Midnight?
That Midoriya's probably thinking, Recovery Girl will heal me anyway,
and is being reckless.
He is full of adrenaline right now, so he probably is not feeling much pain...
But, those injuries...
They probably cannot be fully healed in one go.
Even if he wins, he might not be able to fight his next match.
You cannot keep saying you cannot help it because you cannot control your Quirk.
His power's gone down, but he is gained some control.
He is not just fighting recklessly.
This is the best he can do to win at this point in time.
But man...
Even if it can be healed,
to be able to jump into intense pain like that requires a lot of resolve.
What is stirring him up?
All Might.
I want to be like him.
In order to do that, I have to be strong enough to become number one.
My motivation might seem trivial compared to yours...
I cannot make a fist...!
Smash...!
Why are you going so far?
Because I want to live up to everyone is expectations...
I want to be able to smile... and respond to them...
To be a cool hero...
That is what I want to be!
Shoto...
That is why-
Everyone is giving it their all!
There is no way I can know all of your circumstances, or your resolve.
But for you to become number one without giving it your all,
to completely reject your father...
Right now, I think you should stop screwing around!
Stand up!
If you are downed by something like this, forget beating All Might,
you will not even be able to take the small fry villains-
Please, stop!
He is only five!
He is already five!
Get out of my way!
Mom...!
Shut up.
I do not want to, Mom...
I do not want to be like Dad...
I do not want to become someone who bullies you, Mom!
But you want to be a hero, do not you?
It is okay for you to be one.
As long as you have a future you feel strongly about.
That is why...
I will win!
I will surpass you!
Do not look at that, Shoto.
They are from a different world than you.
Mom, I am going crazy...
I cannot take it anymore.
Every day, the children seem to become more and more like him...
Shoto's...
That child's left side sometimes looks very unsightly to me...
I cannot raise him anymore...
I feel like I should not...
Good grief, this is an important time, too...
Where is Mom?
Oh, she injured you, so I put her in a hospital.
It is your fault.
You are the one who made Mom...
I will reject...
It is your power, is not it?!
Yes, that is right!
Children inherit Quirks from their parents.
But the really important thing is not that connection,
but recognizing your own flesh and blood-
recognizing yourself.
I am here!
Looking back at that time
You see?
But you want to be a hero, do not you?
It is okay for you to be one.
Before I knew it, I had forgotten...
You do not have to be a prisoner of your blood.
It is okay for you to become
who you want to be.
Th-This is...!
The fire's here...
In battle...
He used it!
You made him use his left side...
Young Midoriya, do not tell me you are trying to save Young Todoroki...?
Even though you want to win...
Damn it...
To help your enemy...
Which one of us is screwing around now?
I want... to be a hero, too...!
Shoto!
Huh?
Have you finally accepted yourself?!
That is it!
Good!
It all starts from here for you!
With my blood, you will surpass me...
You will fulfill my desire!
Endeavor suddenly shouts encouragement...?
Such a doting father.
Wow...
Why are you smiling?
With those injuries...
In this situation...
You are crazy...
Do not blame me for what happens next.
Midnight!
If they keep going, it will be bad-
His body will not hold up!
Try to get close...
Come at me with your full power!
Midoriya...
Thanks.
Hey!
What the heck?!
Man, seriously?!
What happened?
Just because something is powerful does not mean it is good,
but this is amazing...
What was that just now...?
What the heck is up with your class?
The air that had been cooled thoroughly was suddenly heated up and expanded.
That is what created this explosion...?
Just how hot was that?!
Jeez, I cannot see a thing!
Hey, who won the match?
M-Midoriya is out of bounds...
Todoroki advances to the third round!
Shoto Todoroki: Origin
Preview
I am Tenya Iida, the class representative of Class A,
and I am responsible for the preview.
This is the same way you started the preview before!
Midoriya, I swear that I will win and advance for you, too!
Yeah, I am sure you can do it, Iida!
Yes, now that I have come this far, I must become number one and tell Tensei.
Next time, Fight on, Iida!
Hello, Mother?
What happened to Tensei?
What in the world happened to my brother, Tensei?!
Next time: Fight on, Iida
Go beyond!
Plus Ultra!
